description: Built and delivered high-performance UI's using React.js, reducing average page load times and improving user satisfaction
Leveraged Next.js Server Components and Server Actions to optimize application performance and reduce client-side load
Implemented Active Directory Federation Services (ADFS) Single Sign-On (SSO) / Single Log-Out (SLO) via custom Node.js middleware, ensuring enterprise security and compliance
Improved application reliability by increasing unit test coverage to 90%+ with Jest and React Testing Library
Enforced team-wide standards with Husky pre-commit hooks and ESLint, ensuring clean and consistent codebases
Migrated session handling from Express.js in-memory store to Redis + PostgreSQL, preventing session leaks and scaling efficiently under load
Automated CI/CD pipelines using Helm, Docker (node-alpine), Jenkins, with AWS and Jenkins-based secret management, reducing deployment time from hours to minutes
Implemented Sharp for high-performance image processing and optimization in production environments
Recently adopted Amazon Q to automate test case generation, boosting efficiency and coverage
Collaborated with teammates through code reviews, ensuring adherence to best practices and boosting code quality and delivery efficiency
Develop APIs to interact with different in house systems
